name: Rubiks Dice
description:
Minimalist RPG game with rubiks cube dice! 

- You can interact with the dice just like a rubik's cube
- The colors on the face determine whether it's an attack or defense.
- Majority red = attack, majority yellow = defense.
- You have 3 actions every round

Art/Design: Frank
Code: Blasin & Jason
Animation: Blasin

Music by: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
